title: Header search paths and system headers
description: Implement -I flag for adding include directories. Add default system include paths (/usr/include, /usr/local/include). Search quoted includes in current directory first, then include paths. Search angle-bracket includes only in system paths. Support -isystem for system header paths. Add -nostdinc to disable standard includes. This enables finding standard library headers like stdio.h, stdlib.h, etc.

title: Phase 1: Minimal integer calculator - lexer, parser, codegen for return statements
description: Build minimal compiler that can handle 'int main() { return 42; }'. Includes lexer for integers/operators, recursive descent parser, and x86-64 code generation for single return statement.

title: Implement #if/#else/#elif with expressions
description: Support #if constant-expression, #else, and #elif for complex conditional compilation. Implement preprocessor expression evaluator (different from C expression evaluator). Support defined(NAME) operator. Support integer constant expressions with arithmetic and logical operators. Handle #else and #elif branches correctly. This enables feature detection and platform-specific code compilation.

title: Phase 4: Pointers and arrays
description: Add pointer types, address-of (&) and dereference (*) operators, array indexing, and pointer arithmetic.

title: Support assignment expressions in parser/codegen
description: Parser currently errors on assignment inside expressions (e.g., (c = 255) < 0). Add assignment to expression grammar and codegen so assignment can be used in comparisons and arithmetic, matching clang's C behavior.

title: ABI: switch int to 32-bit and adjust type sizes
description: Change Type::Int size to 4 bytes, adjust stack alignment, loads/stores, arithmetic, and literal handling to use 32-bit int where appropriate.

title: ABI: adjust struct/array layout rules
description: Match clang layout for structs/arrays in subset: field alignment, padding, array element size, and total struct size/alignment.

title: Phase 6.5: Enums
description: Add enum support (parsing, typing, codegen) with tests and clang-comparison integration coverage.

title: Tokenize enum keyword and constants
description: Add lexer support for enum keyword and reuse identifiers/int literals for enumerators.

title: Parse enum definitions and enumerators
description: Parse enum declarations/definitions (named and anonymous) and enumerator values, and store in AST/symbol tables.

title: Typecheck enums and size rules
description: Add enum type representation and ensure enums behave like ints for size/alignment and in expressions.

title: Codegen enum constants and variables
description: Emit enum constants as integer literals; handle enum-typed vars in codegen and initializers.

title: Integration tests for enums
description: Add tests/files for enum definitions, values, and expression use; compare cc2 vs clang outputs and update snapshots.

title: Phase 5: Tokenize struct keywords and operators
description: Add lexer support for 'struct' keyword and '.'/ '->' operators.

title: Add unsigned char/short/long types
description: Add unsigned char, unsigned short, and unsigned long types with correct size/alignment, codegen, promotions, and tests.

title: Phase 0: Project setup and basic infrastructure
Integration tests: expand C subset coverage
description: Add many tests under tests/files for supported subset (control flow, pointers, arrays, structs, sizeof), with snapshots and clang comparison parity.

title: Phase 2: Variables and function calls
description: Add support for local variables, function definitions, and function calls. Implement stack frame management and calling conventions.

title: Phase 6.6: Unions
description: Add union support (parsing, layout, codegen) with tests and clang-comparison integration coverage.

title: Tokenize union keyword
description: Add lexer support for union keyword.

title: Parse union definitions and member access
description: Parse union definitions and reuse member access syntax; store union layouts alongside structs.

title: Union layout and size rules
description: Compute union size/alignment as max of members and align accordingly; ensure sizeof/offset behavior matches clang.

title: Codegen union loads/stores
description: Handle union member access in codegen by using the union base address and member type for loads/stores.

title: Integration tests for unions
description: Add tests/files for union layout, member access, and initializers; compare cc2 vs clang outputs and update snapshots.

title: Add failing integration tests for assignment truncation/promotion
description: Add tests in tests/files that compare cc2 vs clang for assignment expressions to smaller integer types (char/short/unsigned variants), covering truncation and sign/zero extension expectations.

title: Add unsigned int type
description: Introduce unsigned int in AST/type system, parser, codegen, and tests; ensure correct zero-extension and comparisons.

title: Compiler ABI compliance with clang subset
description: Align cc2 data model/ABI with clang for supported subset (e.g., int=32-bit) so integration tests can compare outputs.

title: Add pointer type system to AST and types
Preprocessor integration tests
description: Create comprehensive tests for preprocessor features. Test #include with various file paths. Test #define object-like and function-like macros. Test conditional compilation (#ifdef, #ifndef, #if, #else, #elif). Test macro expansion edge cases (recursive macros, stringification, token pasting). Test multi-file compilation. Test include guards. Compare preprocessed output with GCC -E. Add test files to tests/files/preprocessor/.

title: Implement #include directive
description: Support #include "file.h" and #include <file.h> directives. Implement file search logic with include paths (-I flag). Handle recursive includes with cycle detection. Support both quoted includes (local directory) and angle-bracket includes (system paths). Read included file and insert its preprocessed content at the #include location.

title: Add array types and indexing syntax
Implement #ifdef/#ifndef/#endif
description: Support conditional compilation with #ifdef NAME, #ifndef NAME, and #endif. Check if macro is defined/undefined in preprocessor symbol table. Skip code blocks when condition is false. Support nested conditionals with proper tracking. This enables include guards pattern (#ifndef HEADER_H / #define HEADER_H / ... / #endif).

title: Add tests for pointers and arrays
Phase 8: Preprocessor Support
description: Add preprocessor support to cc2 compiler, enabling #include, #define macros, conditional compilation (#ifdef, #ifndef, #if, #else, #elif, #endif), and multi-file compilation. This is essential for compiling real C programs that use headers and the standard library.

title: Preprocessor lexer and infrastructure
description: Add preprocessor token recognition to lexer. Recognize # as directive start, and preprocessor keywords (include, define, ifdef, ifndef, endif, if, else, elif, undef, pragma, etc.). Create src/preprocessor.rs module with basic preprocessor infrastructure. The preprocessor should run before parsing, transforming source text into preprocessed text.

title: Phase 6: Preprocessor and multi-file compilation
description: Add preprocessor (#include, #define, conditional compilation), linking multiple object files, and basic standard library support.

title: Phase 5: Parse structs and member access
description: Extend parser/AST/types for struct declarations, struct literals, and member access ('.' and '->').

title: Phase 5: Tests for structs
description: Add tokenize/parse/codegen integration tests covering struct defs, literals, member access, and sizeof.

title: Phase 5: sizeof support
description: Add sizeof operator parsing and codegen, including struct sizes.

title: ABI: update codegen for 32-bit ops and sign/zero extension
description: Use 32-bit regs/instructions for int ops, handle widening to 64-bit where needed (comparisons, returns), and ensure ABI-compliant register usage.

title: Phase 5: Codegen for structs
description: Implement struct layout, member offsets, '.' and '->' access, and sizeof for structs in codegen.

title: Phase 5.5: Common operator support
description: Pre-phase to add commonly used operators (bitwise/shift/modulo and compound assignments) with clang-comparison integration tests.

title: Tokenize compound assignment operators
description: Add lexer support for +=, -=, *=, /=, %=, <<=, >>=, &=, |=, ^= tokens.

title: Parse compound assignments and desugar
description: Extend parser to accept compound assignments in expressions/statements and lower to assignment + binary op in AST.

title: Add bitwise/shift/modulo parsing
description: Implement precedence and AST support for &, |, ^, ~, <<, >>, % operators.

title: Codegen for bitwise/shift/modulo and compound assignment
description: Emit assembly for %, &, |, ^, ~, <<, >> and compound assignment ops with correct width/sign handling.

title: Integration tests for common operators
description: Add tests/files for bitwise ops, shifts, modulo, and compound assignments; compare cc2 vs clang outputs and update snapshots.

title: Finish remaining compound assignments
description: Implement %=, <<=, >>=, &=, |=, ^= compound assignments and cover them in integration tests.

title: Phase 5: Structs and complex types
description: Implement struct definitions, member access (. and ->), type system improvements, and sizeof operator.

title: Implement #define macros
description: Support #define NAME value for simple object-like macros. Support #define NAME(params) body for function-like macros with parameters. Implement macro expansion in source text. Handle stringification (#param) and token pasting (param##other). Support variadic macros with __VA_ARGS__. Implement #undef to undefine macros. Store macros in preprocessor symbol table.

title: Multi-file compilation support
description: Add support for compiling multiple .c files and linking them together. Update CLI to accept multiple input files. Generate separate .o object files for each source file. Implement extern declarations for cross-file function/variable references. Add linking phase (can use system linker initially). Support forward declarations. This enables real C programs split across multiple files.

title: Phase 3: Control flow - if/else and loops
description: Implement conditional statements (if/else) and loops (while/for). Add comparison operators and boolean logic.

title: ABI: update sizeof + pointer arithmetic for new sizes
description: Recompute sizeof and pointer arithmetic scaling after int size change; update tests accordingly.

title: create a plan to create a C compiler in rust incrementally
Fix assignment expressions to coerce to LHS integer type
description: Assignment expressions currently leave the RHS value in %rax without truncation/extension, so an assignment like (char x = 255) used in an expression can compare as 255 instead of -1. Apply integer conversion to match the LHS type before leaving the assignment value for subsequent operations.

title: Phase 7: Documentation Update
description: Update all project documentation to reflect current implementation status. The README and IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN are outdated. Need comprehensive docs covering architecture, features, and development guides.

title: Update README.md with current feature list
Create docs/dev/features.md with detailed feature docs
Update docs/dev/tests.md with current test structure
